SELECT A.rec_a_post_id, A.sigungu_id, A.rec_a_img_id, A.rec_a_title, A.rec_a_content, A.rec_a_view_count, A.rec_a_favorite_cnt, B.sigungu_name, C.sido_name, D.rec_a_img1, D.rec_a_img2, D.rec_a_img3, D.rec_a_img4, D.rec_a_img5 FROM rec_activity_info A LEFT OUTER JOIN region_sigungu B ON A.sigungu_id = B.sigungu_id LEFT OUTER JOIN region_sido C ON C.sido_id = B.sido_id LEFT OUTER JOIN rec_images D ON A.rec_a_img_id = D.rec_a_img_id WHERE A.rec_a_post_id = #{recAPostId}
